title: How long will it take to develop an augmented reality app? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is depends on the requirement. It the requirement has so many features as well as functionalities then it will take more time to develop an augmented reality app. You haven’t specified any industry here so it is quite difficult to provide the exact development time of an AR app. However, It can take 4–6 months to develop an AR app with fewer features. You can contact the top augmented reality company and ask them for an exact time to develop an AR app.

One hour. OK, not really. Developing an Augmented Reality app is just like developing any other app. The effort required depends on many dimensions. Among them: the developers’ skill sets, the breadth and depth of the requirements, the platforms and tools available, and the number of channels that you want to reach. But you can create an AR demo in a very short time frame. I did, using this guide: https://d1.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/web-based-augmented-reality-retail-previews.pdf?did=wp_card&trk=wp_card
